Help broadcasting with a custom type.

I have a custom type and I'm having trouble with broadcasting. I can do

```r .= [1, 3]```
to update the values of `r`. But I don't know what kind of broadcasting tool to implement to get

```r[1:2] .= [3, 6]```
to work. I've defined `copyto!(r::MyType, bc::Base.Broadcasted)` but that doesn't seem to automatically get me broadcasted setindex.
